tgt_original: 菩薩、如來、薩云若亦爾。 菩薩空、薩云若空，一空無二； 菩薩於般若波羅蜜當作是住。

tgt_original: 「云何，須菩提！ 菩薩摩訶薩不於般若波羅蜜中住？

tgt_original: 」須菩提言：

tgt_original: 菩薩初地不當於中住，至第十地不當於中住，有所倚也。

src_original: ṣaṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  saptamyāṃ bhūmau na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  aṣṭamyāṃ bhūmau na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  navamyāṃ bhūmau na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  daśamyāṃ bhūmau na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.  punar aparaṃ kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prathamacittotpāde sthitvā dānapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 從初地言我當具足檀波羅蜜，不當於中住；

src_original: śīlapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  kṣāntipāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  vīryapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  dhyānapāramitāṃ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 於尸波羅蜜、羼波羅蜜、惟逮波羅蜜、禪波羅蜜、般若波羅蜜，不當於中住有所倚。 我當具足成就三十七品，不當於中住有所倚。

src_original: bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  bodhisattvaniyāmam avakramya buddhabhūmau sthāsyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.  (ŚsP II-2 179)
tgt_original: 我從菩薩道至阿惟越致地住，不當於中住。

src_original: pañcabodhisattvābhijñāḥ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 菩薩具足五通，不當於中住有所倚住。

src_original: pañcasu bodhisattvābhijñāsu sthitvā aprameyāny asaṃkhyeyāni buddhakṣetrāṇy upasaṃkramiṣyāmi  buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ darśanāya vandanāya paryupāsanāya dharmaśravaṇāya śrutvā ca
tgt_original: 菩薩神通已，言我當遊無量阿僧祇佛國，見諸佛如來聽受法教已，轉復教授一切眾生，亦不當於中住有所倚。

src_original: tathatvāya parebhyo deśayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam upalambhayogena.  yādṛśāni ca teṣāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ buddhakṣetrāni tadṛśāni eva pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 言我亦當變化作如諸佛如來世界所有，亦不當於中住有所倚也。 般若波羅蜜不當於中住有所倚也。

src_original: sattvān bodhau paripācayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
tgt_original: 我當教授眾生至道，亦不當於中住。

src_original: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃś ca lokadhātuṃ gatvā tān tathāgatān arhataḥ samyaksaṃbuddhān satkariṣyāmīti gurukariṣyāmīti mānayiṣyāmīti pūjayiṣyāmīti,  puṣpamālyagandhavilepanacūrṇacīvaracchatradhvajapatākābhiḥ koṭīniyutaśatasahasraiś ca tāṃs tathāgatāṃ pūjayiṣyāmīty evam api na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 我當供養無央數阿僧祇諸佛，時諸幢幡香華繒蓋無央數億百千張疊，不當於中住。

src_original: aprameyāsaṃkhyeyāṃ sattvān anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
tgt_original: 我當成就無央數阿僧祇眾生，令得阿耨多羅三耶三佛，亦不當於中住。

src_original: pañcacakṣuṣy utpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena. katamāni pañca?  māṃsacakṣur divyacakṣuḥ prajñācakṣur dharmacakṣur buddhacakṣur utpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  sarvasamādhīṃ paripūrayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  yena yena punaḥ samādhīn ākāṅkṣayiṣyāmi vikrīḍituṃ tena tena samādhinā vikrīḍiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogema,
tgt_original: 我當具足五眼： 肉眼、天眼、法眼、慧眼、佛眼，亦不當於中住。 我皆當起諸三昧，亦不當於中住。 亦不當願言，我得是三昧時，當於中遊戲，亦不當於中住。

src_original: sarvadhāraṇīmukhāni pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
tgt_original: 具足陀隣尼門，不當於中住。

src_original: daśatathāgatabalāni pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  catvāri vaiśāradyāni pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  catasraḥ pratisaṃvidaḥ pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 我當具足四無礙慧、四無所畏、佛十種力、佛十八法，亦不當於中住。

src_original: mahāmaitrīṃ pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  mahākaruṇāṃ pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  aṣṭādaśāveṇikān buddhadharmān pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti evam api bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 我當具足四等心、大慈大悲，亦不當於中住。

src_original: dvātriṃśatāni mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇāni kāye pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam (ŚsP II-2 180)
tgt_original: 我當具足三十二大士之相、八十種好，不當於中住有所倚也。

src_original: aśīty anuvyañjanāni kāye pariniṣpādayiṣyāmīti bodhisattvena mahāsattvena na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.  śuddhānusārīni na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  dharmānusārīni na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  aṣṭamaka iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  srotaāpanna iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 住八輩事成就信要法要，不當於中住。

src_original: saptakṛtvabhavaparamam iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 須陀洹至第七，不當於中住。

src_original: kulaṃkula ity ekavīcika iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  samaśīrṣapudgala iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 斯陀含一種，不當於中住。 道等，不當於中住。

src_original: āyuḥkṣaye kleśakṣaye ceti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 命終垢盡，不當於中住。

src_original: avinipātadharmā iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  sakṛdāgāmi sakṛd imaṃ lokam āgamya duḥkhasyāṃ taṃ kariṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 須陀洹中道般泥洹，不當於中住。 斯陀含未斷諸苦本，不當於中住。

src_original: anāgagāmiphalasākṣātkriyāyai pratikannaka iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  anāgāmi tatraiva nirvāsyatīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 得阿那含道意，不當於中住。 於阿那含中中道般泥洹，不當於中住。

src_original: arhatphalasākṣātkriyāyaiḥ pratipannaka iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  arhann ihaivānupadhiśeṣanirvāṇadhātau parinirvāpayiṣyatīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 得阿羅漢證、成阿羅漢，從是間於無餘泥洹而般泥洹，不當於中住。

src_original: pratyekabuddha iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 辟支佛，不當於中住。 過羅漢、辟支佛至菩薩地，不當於中住。 道事慧，不當於中住有所倚也。

src_original: mārgākārajñatājñāne sarvākārajñatāyāṃ ca na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  sarvākāraiḥ sarvadharmān abhisaṃbuddhā sarvāvāsanā na saṃvikte śakṣayāyāṃ na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbudhya dharmacakrapravartayiṣyāmīti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  buddhakārye kṛtvā aprameyān asaṃkhyeyān lokadhātūn parinirvāpayiṣyāmīti,  evam api na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
tgt_original: 以眾事成阿惟三佛，不當於中住。 從次諸垢消盡，不當於中住。 成如來、等正覺、無所著，當轉法輪，不當於中住。 我當為佛事，度不可計一切眾生，不當於中住。 以四神足於三昧住命恒邊沙劫，不當於中住。

src_original: aparimitaś ca me āyur bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
tgt_original: 令我壽命無有數，不當於中住。

src_original: dvātriṃśatāṃ me mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇānām ekaikalakṣaṇaṃ śatapuṇyapariniṣpannaṃ bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 於三十二大士之相，一相成百福功德，不當於中住。

src_original: yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ pūrveṇa,  yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavo dakṣiṇena,  yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paścimena,  yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātava uttareṇa,  yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ uttarapūrveṇa,  yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukopamā (ŚsP II-2 181)  lokadhātavaḥ pūrvadakṣiṇena,  yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavo dakṣiṇapaścimena,  yāvanto gaṅgānadīvālukopamā lokadhātavaḥ paścimottareṇa,  tāvanta ekaṃ me buddhakṣetraṃ bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 使我一佛國大如十方恒邊沙佛國，不當於中住。

src_original: vajropamo me trisāhasramahāsāhasro lokadhātur bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
tgt_original: 使我三千大千剎土盡作金剛，不當於中住。

src_original: bodhivṛkṣāś ca me tādṛśo gandho niścaret,  ye sattvās taṃ gandham ājighreyus teṣām na rāgadveṣamohāś ca vyābādheyur iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  na śrāvakacittaṃ na pratyekabuddhacittam utpadyeyur iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  sarve ca te niyatā bhaveyur anuttarāyā samyaksaṃbuddhāv iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 使我佛樹中出香，一切眾生聞其香者無有三毒，不起聲聞、辟支佛意；

src_original: ye ca sattvās taṃ bodhivṛkṣagandham ājighreyus teṣāṃ na kaścid vyādhir bhaved kāye vā citte veti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.  tatra ca me buddhakṣetre na rūpaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  na vedanāśabdo bhaven na saṃjñāśabdo bhaven na saṃskāraśabdo bhaven na vijñānaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  na dhātuśabdo nāyatanaśabdo na pratītyasamutpādaśabdo bhaved iti sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  na dānapāramitāśabdo bhaven na śīlapāramitāśabdo bhaven na kṣāntipāramitāśabdo bhaven  na vīryapāramitāśabdo bhaven na dhyānapāramitāśabdo bhaven na prajñāpāramitāśabdo  bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 有聞是香者，身病意病皆悉除愈，令我佛土不聞五陰色痛想行識、六波羅蜜之聲，不當於中住。

src_original: nādhyātmaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na bahirdhāśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nādhyātmabahirdhāśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  na śūnyatāśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na mahāśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na paramārthaśūnyatāśabdo  nātyantaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nānavarāgraśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nānavakāraśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na prakṛtiśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  na sarvadharmaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na svalakṣaṇaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nānupalambhaśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  nābhāvaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven na svabhāvaśūnyatāśabdo bhaven nābhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena, (ŚsP II-2 182)  na smṛtyupasthānaśabdo bhaven na samyakprahāṇaśabdo bhaven na ṛddhipādaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavyam upalambhayogena,  nendriyaśabdo bhaven na balaśabdo bhaven na bodhyaṅgaśabdo bhaven nāryāṣṭāṅgamārgaśabdo bhaven nāryasatyaśabdo bhaved iti na sthātavaym upalambhayogena,
tgt_original: 令我佛國不聞三十七品及十八法，不聞須陀洹上至佛之聲，不當於中住。

src_original: tathā hi tathāgatenārhatā samyaksaṃbuddhenānuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbuddhya sarvadharmā nopalabdhāḥ.
tgt_original: 如來、無所著、等正覺成阿惟三佛，於諸法亦無所得。

src_original: evaṃ khalu kauśika bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ na sthātavyam upalambhayogena.
tgt_original: 如是，拘翼！ 菩薩於般若波羅蜜無所倚住。

src_original: athāyuṣmataḥ śāradvatīputasyaitad abhūt:
tgt_original: 」爾時尊者舍利弗意念：

src_original: kathaṃ punar bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthātavyam?
tgt_original: 「菩薩摩訶薩當云何住？

src_original: abhijñāsu naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ,  samādhiṣu naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ,  dhāraṇīmukheṣu naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ,  tathāgatabaleṣu naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ,
tgt_original: 「諸佛無所住。 不住意有所止，亦不於五陰住，亦不住於成就，亦不住於不成就，亦不住於有為無為，不於十八法、薩云若有所住。

src_original: sarvākārajñatāyāṃ naiva sthito nāsthitaḥ.  evaṃ khalv āyuṣmañ chāradvatīputra bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ śikṣitavyaṃ sthātavyam ity asthānayogena.  (ŚsP II-2 186)
tgt_original: 「菩薩摩訶薩住般若波羅蜜中，當如諸如來、無所著、等正覺住如不住。 菩薩當作是住，住無處所住。

src_original: atha khalu tatra parṣadi keṣāñcid devaputrāṇām etad abhavat:
tgt_original: 」於是會中有天子作是念：

src_original: yāni tāni yakṣāṇāṃ yakṣapadāni yakṣamantritāni yakṣarutāni yakṣapravyāhṛtāni vijñāyante,  tāni mantrayamāṇāni,  idaṃ punar api na vijñāyate yad āryasubhūtiḥ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate pravyāharati deśayati vibhajaty uttānīkaroti upadiśati.
tgt_original: 「諸閱叉所語所說悉皆可知，尊者須菩提所說般若波羅蜜教了不可知。

src_original: athāyuṣmān subhūtis teṣāṃ devaputrāṇāṃ cetasaiva cetaḥparivitarkam ājñāya tān devaputrān āmantrayate sma,
tgt_original: 」須菩提知諸天子意所念，語諸天子言：

src_original: na vijñāyate devaputrāṇām āmantrayate.
tgt_original: 「不解不知耶？

src_original: devaputrā āhuḥ:
tgt_original: 」諸天子言：

src_original: na vijñāyate āryasubhūte.
tgt_original: 「爾，須菩提！ 實不解不知也。

src_original: subhūtir āha:
tgt_original: 」須菩提語諸天子言：

src_original: tathā hi devaputrā ekākṣaram api na pravyāhrite tan na śruyate yan na śruyate tan na vijñāyate. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 「我所說者，常不見一字，教亦無聽者。 何以故？

src_original: na hy akṣarāṇi prajñāpāramitā na cātra kaścid deśayitā na śrotā na vijñātā. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 般若波羅蜜者非文字亦無聽聞。 何以故？

src_original: anakṣarā hi devaputrās tathāgatānām arhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ bodhiḥ tad yathāpi
tgt_original: 諸天子！ 諸如來、無所著、等正覺道亦無文字。

src_original: nāma devaputrās tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho buddhanirmitaṃ nirmimīte. sa ca punar  nirmitaś catasraparṣado nirmimītaḥ bhikṣubhikṣuṇyupāsakopāsikāḥ.
tgt_original: 諸天子！ 譬如如來化作佛，作四輩弟子。

src_original: atha sa nirmitaḥ tābhyo nirmitābhyaś catasṛbhyaḥ parṣadbhyo dharmaṃ deśayet. tat kiṃ manyadhve?  devaputrāḥ. api tu tatra parṣadi kenacid deśitaṃ bhavet?  kenacic chrutam ājñātaṃ ca bhavet?
tgt_original: 作是化已，為說化諸法。 於諸天子意云何，是頗有教有說、寧有受者不？ 」諸天子言：
